abstract: Whole Foods Market will sponsor environmentally minded movies in film centers like New York and Los Angeles, but also less movie-saturated places, like Kansas City, Mo., and Omaha.
snippet: Whole Foods Market will sponsor environmentally minded movies in film centers like New York and Los Angeles, but also less movie-saturated places, like Kansas City, Mo., and Omaha.
lead_paragraph: LOS ANGELES — Rutabagas. Rice cakes. Roll ’em?

headline.main: Whole Foods to Sponsor Environmental Film Festival
